title: Beyond Belief
description: Eight Strange Tales of Otherworlds------------------SF anthology containing the following stories:- Evelyn E. Smith: The Hardest Bargain- Willy Ley [as by Robert Willey]: The Invasion- Isaac Asimov: It's Such a Beautiful Day- Theodore Sturgeon: The Man Who Lost the Sea- Clark Ashton Smith: Phoenix- Richard Matheson: Third from the Sun- Murray Leinster: Keyhole- Arthur C. Clarke: History Lesson
author: Richard J. Hurley
